items.title: Automakers seek ‘opportunity in the chaos’ of Trump’s tariffs
items.content: Ford and Stellantis are offering employee-pricing programs, while Hyundai said it would not raise prices for at least two months to ease consumer concerns.

items.title: Medicare, Medicaid agency cuts jobs from minority health office, other divisions, as RFK Jr. guts U.S. health department

items.title: Stellantis idles plants in Mexico and Canada due to tariffs

items.title: Mortgage rates sink on tariffs, but housing costs are still near a record high
items.content: Mortgage rates fell sharply Thursday, following the Trump administration's tariff announcement, but a huge share of Americans still can't afford to buy a home.

items.title: QVC is betting on TikTok to help revive its live shopping business
